name: Chuck Leider
text: No cheese on a pizza. What the heck??? How does this happen?  No where on the receipt does it say no cheese. Better order from some other pizza place.  Pretty sad they can‚Äôt get this correct.

name: Xavier Gomez
text: Pizza made to Order! Very good topping choices! Outdoor dining area is great! Service is awesome! Come get a slice or five!

name: Darya Mayeuskaya
text: Last week (07/17) we ordered a pizza with a pick-up at the cafe. We picked it up, and when we came home, it appeared that pizza didn‚Äôt have mushrooms, but it was on the receipt we get from them. We live about 15 min from this place and we ‚Ä¶More

name: Teresa White-Heximer
text: This was a pleasant surprise. We opted for the build your own pizza. Fresh toppings. Baked perfectly.

name: Jennifer P.
text:
2.5 stars.
This was my first time trying Blaze Pizza. The service was fast and friendly. It was easy to order but it felt like I was rushed even though the restaurant was ‚Ä¶More

name: The Momshell
text: The crust was cooked perfectly. The toppings were a little scant but fresh and tasty. Love the balsamic glaze on top. I love the blood orange lemonade. Service was good. Wish there were plates to share your pizza with. The patio overlooks a very pretty view with a lake and ducks and turtles.

name: A. Addison
text: Excellent pizza. I love the ability to pick fresh toppings and the fresh crust.

name: Angelica Leyva
text: Staff is wonderful pizza is nice those twin brother managers do a really good job

name: Matthew Whosoever
text: Been here a bunch of times, different times of the day, workdays for lunch, weekends during busy times, and its always good. Never had a burnt or bad tasting pizza. Staff is always patient while I pick my toppings as well.

name: Maggie Cruz
text: I like the pizza but they hardly put any ingredients. I have to keep telling them to add more cheese and toppings, if not they will just add sprinkles of cheese and a few pepperoni slices. So if you decide to go don't be afraid to ask for them to add more.

name: Marcia Knudsen
text: Was so excited to try this place. They now serve a keto crust. It tasted great. But the toppings were just nonexistent. And we had to pay $12 ($4 more than regular pizza). Also, they messed up our order on all 3 pizzas. They were not that crowded. How did that guy screw up ALL 3???

name: Taylor Roberson
text: I went here yesterday around 4ish and I had a great experience. I‚Äôm transitioning to a vegan lifestyle and the employees were so informative, patient, welcoming, and nice.  Definitely will be back and I highly recommend to try  this restaurant.

name: Joshua
text: Fantastic pizza! We hope to visit a location again soon.

name: glenda annis
text: Best Pizza in the city, maybe the world. Seriously.  Great bar, great service. Highly recommended!

name: Sheela F
text: Staff was friendly and didnt rush us in ordering since this was our first time visiting. Traveled with my dog since I was leaving out of town and generous outdoor seating is available viewing the water and ducks. Made for a good atmosphere.

name: Aroldo S
text: I love food & currently I have been on a plant based diet, this is my perfect cheat meal. Cauliflower crust, vegan cheese, all the veggies I want! Delicious üòãüòã edit* they are out of Cauliflower & Keto crust till March but still advertise it! I waited in line for 20 minutes to hear this

name: Drea Staples
text: Super delicious! I love how there‚Äôs so many options. I made my own and it was so yummy, I ate the whole thing!! This was my first time and order ahead of time so I didn‚Äôt have to wait. This will be my new place to order pizza.

name: Sara Castillo
text: We love this place! Can't go wrong with all their options. I love their pesto and goat cheese! Yum yum!

name: Daniel Ngo
text: This place is awesome! It is like Chipotle but for pizza. I don't even really like pizza, but the pricing, customizability, and thin crust make this place very worth it.

name: Melissa J
text: I wish I could leave zero stars. I ordered a pizza from here and they charged my card, but by the time I got there ten minutes later, they said they were closed. I have been fighting them for 2 weeks trying to get a refund for food I never ‚Ä¶More

name: medical jobs
text: Can‚Äôt get an order correct. I‚Äôm not sure if the employees can‚Äôt read an order in English that is completed online or if people the management hires can not read English. Order a pizza and it has no cheese???  What the heck??? This place is a joke.

name: Debbie Wilson
text: So good. You get to build your own pizza or choose one already with designated toppings. Salads are great too!

name: yong spires
text: Great thin crust fire roasted pizza. A salad, appetizer and one pizza is perfect for two people.

name: Chanda Wiltz
text: This was our first visit. The place is very fast pace so you have to be ready to order upon arrival. I went there because I wanted to try the keto pizza. It was tasty. I would definitely visit then again.

name: Charles Li
text: They serve customized hot krispy pizzas with lots of choices of meat and vegetables available. There are many seats available outside by a stream with many ducks floating around. It's a nice restaurant with good scenery, and I'll be back again shortly...

name: edwin ramirez
text:
Good food
Good service
Just one suggestion....change out ypur gloves when making more than one pizza.

name: Kimberly Kiernan
text: Pretty good pizza. It's a great deal for what you get. It's chipotle style line but with pizza. You pick your dough, sauce, cheese and toppings. This is the third time we've been, and we've enjoyed it each time. The crusty is thin and ‚Ä¶More

name: JOHN B
text:
THIS PICTURE IS HOW MY BLAZE PIZZA WAS DELIVERED FROM THEIR DELIVERY SERVICE PROVIDER "DOOR DASH" FROM THIS STORE!

text: My 1st time and I must say very good nice thin crust. I will be back

name: calvin yep
text: Yum! Put what you like most and invent something new. Wonderful service and split a large pizza. Just enough and room for conversation. Relaxing atmosphere

name: Marina
text: The pizza was sooo good, they use fresh products. I also liked thin crust (they have gluten free crust also of needed). Apart from that, staff are really nice. I recommend this place.

name: Phenomenal Indy
text: I love blaze pizza!! The customer service is great but this was my first time at the Sugar Land location. The pizza was not cooked long enough so the pizza wasn't tasty at all so i called back the next day spoke with Lalo & of course he ‚Ä¶More

name: Stephanie Pace
text: Small place with a small seating area. Order a set pizza or make it all your own. Lots of options to put on your pizza. Pricing is pretty decent. Fire cooked pizza that delivers a crunchy crust and delicious pizza. One pizza can be for one person, but I couldn‚Äôt quite finish my green stripe pizza.

name: Maria R
text: Not sure what happened recently but it's worse now. The people aren't as energetic/ attentive, the quality isn't as good (the pesto sauce was yellow, the arugula looks old), and the price stucture is  different too (they asked whether we ‚Ä¶More

name: Jawed Sawani
text: Awesome pizza. Great people

name: Joe Walker
text: My make whatever you want best Pizza!

name: Bernadette James- TX REALTOR
text: Many toppings to choose from. Quick service and friendly staff.

name: Tadd Pham
text: $7.95 for two toppings pizza (November 2018). Made your own thin crushed pizza. Delicious and quick to order. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ajay Babu Amudala Bhasker
text: One of best pizza I‚Äôve had.

name: Robbie Jansky
text: Pretty good simple pie with lots of choices for toppings great quick friendly service economical lunch price and always cool inside. #yourTEXASrealtor

name: Yvonne Hinshaw
text: Tasty food with lots of options. The crust came out nice and crispy! I also appreciate that they have moved away from straws as the norm and are asking customers to request straws instead of just putting them out. It's everyone doing little ‚Ä¶More

name: Karri Sidwell
text: Delicious. It's set up to choose your ingredients as you go through the line. The ingredients were fresh and portions were spot on.

name: Moaiz Ali
text: I LOVEE Blazee Pizzzaa!! Honestly the up front took care of us so well and we asked for extra stuff and she didnt charge us extra or show us an attitude like other places... This location is amazing and near the house which is a great bonus!! The pizza was soo tasty and delicious just couldnt get enough!! Thanks Blaze Pizzaa

name: Steven Schwartz
text: Build it the way you like it, pick and add whatever ingredients you want from the broad selection.

name: Mat Ri
text: Pizza place very similar to MOD pizza only not as good. Avoid the arugula even though I usually put it on, it tasted funky. The patio view is the best part of the place. Not a bad place, just doesn't stack up to other options.

name: Mack R
text: Great pizza and service! Not only that but I appreciate the sign saying that they‚Äôre accepting of the LGTBQ+ community. It‚Äôs nice to know it‚Äôs a welcoming restaurant. I also liked that the cups they gave out had lids that didn‚Äôt need straws ‚Ä¶More

name: Angela B
text: Best pizza! I love the crust and the fact that you can make your own pizza is the best! Everyone working there is very friendly and efficient. Even when there‚Äôs a long line and lots of people, it moves quickly.

name: Nat M
text: Love this place! The pizza sauce is delicious and many toppings to choose from.

name: Don Vega
text: Pick my own toppings!

name: Jeremy Howard
text: Always fresh and tasty! No matter which location I try the customer service is usually amazing. Keep up the great work!

name: Carlos Garcia
text: I had the keto crust pizza here and was not impressed. I tasted my friends pizza and was still not impressed. We ordered three pizzas and a couple drinks and the total came our to $40. For brick oven pizza I would recommend Grimaldis across the street. It tastes better and is priced better.

name: J W
text: Typical made to order pizza place. Good food.

name: Clo Mitchell
text: I've always liked this place but I've recently visited to try out their vegan pizza options and it was amazing! The soy chorizo adds some serious spice and the housemade cheese is creamy but not daiya cheese creamy. The best vegan pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Annie Pham
text: Great service and staff.  We asked for high rise and didnt give us high rise dough when they were putting the veggies on and corrected it.  They gave us our whole meal free to our surprise.  Food was fresh tasting and hot.

name: Md Nabil Ahsan
text: Love this place! I stopped buying pizza from anywhere else. I always go for "Build Your Own Pizza" and add goat cheese, regardless of the other toppings.

name: Doris Tran
text: Quick service, great food quality, and friendly staff!

name: Sheldon Watts
text: Great food. Best pizza, definitely beats all other mainstream pizza chains. Fresh ingredients vegetarian friendly. Great place

name: Dan Lam
text: The pizza is always very tasty.  This week, buy a $25 gift card for the next purchase, you get a free pizza free with the current  order.

name: Kirk Potter
text: I believe this is actually the best Pizza experience I've ever had.

name: Sasha Davani
text: As always, the best pizza around!

name: Jeanette Harris-Osei
text: Ordered the Keto crust. Could have been better if they hadn't burned the crust.

name: Glenda Manning
text: Service good, pizza great!

name: Fahad Kamal
text: Great staff!  Excellent service!  The manager, Maricela is friendly and patient with the customers.

name: Theresa Tran
text: Quick, personalized pizza with friendly service. Great price too! Build your own pizza starts at $7.95. Clean shop but really cold inside.

name: Oscar Lagunas
text: As soon as I walked in I was immediately greeted by a worker named Brenda. She was very helpful in assisting me with the menu as it was my first time ordering there. This other worker named Johnathan was also very helpful when it came to ‚Ä¶More

text: Amazing frezh made pizza infront of you, pick as many toppings as you want which they have a plethora of like artichoke, whole cloves of roasted garlic and many more. Not to mention the lrices are good and the agua frescas are amazing!

name: David Nguyen
text: The pizza here is amazing, especially given the price. The staff is fast and efficient, and have never given me anything below spectacular customer service. We came during their Pi Day promo where they had a line out the door, but we were ‚Ä¶More

name: Sam Campbell
text: The best of the pick your own toppings fast fried pizza place in town. Always clean. Nice deck in back overlooking lake to eat at. A good selection of drinks other than soda eaters

name: Lucelly Torres
text: This is our favorite pizza place.  The crust, the choose your own ingredients, the quickness, the flavors,  there‚Äôs just no comparison.  This place rocks!

name: Jerrod Linderman
text: Love this place you can design your whole pizza the way you want it with all the toppings you want it for a great price fast and friendly service found myself going back multiple times.

name: Skye Lam
text: The best pizza place! Toppings are always fresh and delicious and I usually substitute sauce with olive oil. Makes the dough crispier and not as heavy!

name: Preston Watts
text: Great pizza, cool fun staff. Perfectly sized personal pizzas and you can load them up if you‚Äôve got an appetite. Dig in!

name: Melissa Polanco
text: We ate here during a business meeting, it was amazing!

name: merodii rei
text: The pizza was really good, as per usual! However, the loud music was rather annoying. It made it difficult to focus on conversation  and to even hear ones own thoughts. It's also frustrating from a customers point of view when the staff ‚Ä¶More

name: Moye Wicks
text: We liked the thin crust.

name: Dannie
text: I would normally go into great detail about my very unpleasant experience at this restaurant today, however, when I brought my pizza back because it was wrong, I was helped by Walter, he was friendly, apologetic, and, most importantly he ‚Ä¶More

name: Ethan P
text: Professional staff and quick service. Even on busy days the line moves at a reasonable pace. The pizza is definitely fresh since they make it right in front of you.

name: Paul Anderson
text: Good pizza. We come here every Friday

name: Adrian Morales
text: Fun for kids, polite staff, great food.

name: Gary K. Wells
text: Great food and Service - Wildly Creative Pizza Options are not only possible here - but probable. Do you taste buds a favor and stop in today - creating your own custom pizza will leave them swimming in food heaven.

name: Chetan Mehta
text: Decent pizza.  Good value for money!  Sometimes they are out of some basic toppings like onions!!  Check first before ordering!! Overall, very good service.

name: Marvi Bana
text: Clean, decent staff, great selections of pizza toppings. Pizza made to order in a good amount of time. I've been here multiple times. Never had a bad experience.

name: James Townsend
text: They have got great customisable pizza here. Friendly staff work in a fast pace environment to quickly prepare your pizza for you. The price is great for what you can get here. ‚Ä¶More

name: Heather Ingram
text: I frequent this location all the time. But this trip stood out. We came in on pi day for discount pizzas. This is the first time I have ever been to a restaurant on a day if a sale and they were adequately staffed. Our wait, no lie, with ‚Ä¶More

name: Creole
text: Great pizza! I‚Äôve had the opportunity to compare other brand pizza‚Äôs to this pizza and where others fail Blaze Pizza by far prevails in flavor, freshness, quality and cost. I also have to add consistency, they have been consistently delicious and that is just good American standard!

name: Kathryn Hill
text: Very good pizza. Kiddos love it

name: Christen Sadler
text: I love Blaze pizza! They have several vegan options which is hard to find when it comes to pizza. This location has very friendly staff, but they were super stingy on the toppings.

name: Eva Sanchez
text: I  love eating here! I like to create my own and get half one way and the other half another, it's like two for one.  The Aguas are very good. Not to expensive.

name: Ryan Hartline
text: Good, fast pizza and friendly, helpful staff. What I like most about this location is the patio seating in the back! Great for kids to be able to be a little louder and have more freedom than if inside. Also they can look out at the ducks in and around the water feature surrounding the businesses.

name: mermaidt13 glow
text: I love blaze I come here sooooo much they know my name and order.

name: Barbara
text: Delicious and well priced for pizza. We've ordered before through grub hub but definitely it tastes way better if you dine in! Great service also!

name: S G
text: Like the fact that you can see the pizza options and pick and choose what you want.  Was fun for my teenagers.

name: Belinda Woo
text: Always a great personal pizza.

name: Dick Critelli
text: Outstanding veggie pizza on a Lent Friday !!

name: Yolanda Liu
text: Great place for sharable size pizza!

name: Anna Flores
text: I prefer Blaze to Mod pizza because of the quality of the ingredients. I love that goat cheese is available. I end up making a great combination. Goat cheese, spinach, salami, with spicy sauce...also, the staff is always friendly!

name: Beatrice Lerma
text: I give it 3 stars only due to the fact that they don't have a baby changing station in the restroom. I had to change my baby's diaper in my trunk while it was drizzling outside. It's 2019 and y'all should have one in BOTH restrooms. But the food was delicious.

name: Chelsea J
text: Was my first visit there, and the associate that greeted me could tell. She was helpful and friendly. So was the other associated who handed me my pizza !! good vibes chill atmosphere.

name: Carlos Valdez
text: It was so delicious!!

name: Tabitha Jimenez
text: Super good food, lively staff and speedy service

name: Linh Truong
text: I'm so excited that they have the keto crust. Now I can go out to a pizza place with friends and family without having to worry about finding something else to eat, or resorting to a salad. ‚Ä¶More

name: Natalie Salvide
text: Great place to eat!! Litzy, Lalo, Ana and Edgar have ya great customer service. And they have cauliflower crust perfect for Keto!!

name: Hugo Galicia
text: Great food and great service as always!  We love Blaze Pizza!

name: A for Adventure
text: One of my favorite places to go for some pie. They let you customize it the way you want.

name: C Espinosa
text: Great food, fast service, great price $7.95 pizza any toppings

name: Elliot Thomas
text: Good pizza, good prices, fast service. Basically the chipotle of pizza but actually high quality. Cooked in a faux woodfired oven for that gourmet crust. No complaints.

name: Uncle D
text: Liked it a lot. At first, since Blaze Pizza is different and it is like a Subway where you build your own sandwich., I thought the ingredients were processed. After I got my order, it was actually fresh. I like the way this place is unique from other Pizzerias. I apologize for doubting on the manager. I apologize.

name: Silvia Mendoza
text: Stopped to see what the deal was today Sunday 03/17/19.  We ordered 2 meat lovers pizza and they were missing the meats, it was disappointing.  Not worth the trip view from the outside was nice and so was the blood orange lemonade that's it.

name: Chiti Ho
text: Build your own delicious pizza, it‚Äôs quick and easy. Good for quick lunch and casual dinner. Love it.

name: Greg Moore
text: I‚Äôve been coming to this location for a while now I‚Äôm always greeted when I walk in especially by Angel he‚Äôs always has positive energy no matter if it‚Äôs early in the day or 5 minutes before closing. The food is great but the customer service is why I continue to come back!

name: Peter Young
text: Have had good experiences here before, however, quality is now hit and miss...last night we did carry out, got home and discovered my wife's pizza was missing ingredients and my white top was entirely missing its white top! ‚Ä¶More

name: joan m
text: Pizza were custom made according to the request of clients. Fast services and clean area.

name: Polymer Pumpkin
text: The pizza is not expensive, the crust was ready, you pick your sauce and your veggies as you go down the line, so I did a build your own pizza, and it was ready in a literal Flash! They flash cook it for 3 minutes, I think all pizzas might ‚Ä¶More

name: Roscoe Hillis
text: Great place to eat, staff is phenomenal had dinner there for my second time and can‚Äôt stop loving it. Them Aguas frescas no joke, mango is bomb. Very inexpensive and quality ingredients, found my new pizza spot. 5 stars all around. Great job guys.

name: jon ross
text: Taste great just like mod pizza

name: San Lucas
text: Great place, great pizza.  A little like Subway, you get to put whichever toppings you like.  Then it only takes 3-5 min to cook.  They could probably use an extra associate at this location, as it can get busy, but service overall is very good.

name: Emilio Estevez
text: This place is always busy but never had a bad experience. Their KETO Crust was interesting and while it's not as good as actual carbs it does satisfy those on the keto diet. FYI - It's expensive. $13+ for just the pizza.

name: Prem Patel
text: Amazing pizza! Always packed

name: T Clark
text: Incredible! Delicious, somthing for every taste!

name: Liz Dewey
text: I love that they have keto pizza and clean ingredients

name: K M
text: Nice place to grab brick oven pizza and a salad. Prices are a little high but food is good quality.

name: Sam Sbeiti
text: Great tasting pizza.

name: Princess O'Haver
text: First time visit. The crew was friendly & lively, even at the late time of night we were there. The pizza was made fresh in front of us to order. The wait was not long at all. The size is perfect for two with a salad on the side. Such a welcome change from the standard chains. Definitely will return.

name: Keilani Rullan
text: Poor service at this location, and they barely even put toppings on your pizza, I'll stick to mod pizza.

name: Victor
text: Choose from several fresh meats, veggies and cheeses. Pick your size, sauce and add your toppings. Once its built, its baked and served up hot. A self serve drink station completes the experience. ‚Ä¶More

name: Anurag Kumar
text: Almost as good as Neopolitan.

name: Kimberley Cotton
text: Took the family, 3 generations, to Blaze last night.  The kids love it, even when it is too cold to sit outside.  Every one loves making their own and then we share.  Last night was extremely busy.  The line was longer than usual but we ‚Ä¶More

name: September Nelson
text: My family's first time there. The food and quantity was good. The process was a little confusing on what you were being charged for and what came with the different menu items. With 2 kids and a line behind us, I was frustrated. Now that I know the process I may go back.

name: ThePrettyeyes341
text: Pizza doesn't seem to be completely done to me. Toppings still soft and sliding around on the pizza.

name: K Tran
text: Came for BlazePiDay. It was super busy but all the employees were still very helpful. Met the owner also, super nice guy. Pizza was baked to order and delicious! Will definitely come back again

name: Serena Molaison
text: Pizza is great and the customer service is even better!!

name: Michael
text: You‚Äôre able to customize your own pizza and toppings in every blaze pizza place! The employees here are extremely patient with the customers and very friendly! Definitely coming back to this location!

name: Anthony Elizondo

text: Great concept. Good for kids and grown ups. Made to order deliciousness

name: Khoa Ho

name: Charlotte Cheng

name: T Nguyen
text: Fantastic customer service provided by Angel, Jose and everyone there! Wonderful staff that is friendly and welcoming.  They are diligent in their work and care for the customization of your pizza. Definitely coming back.

name: zach powers

name: Auto Dept
text: Amazing place  with delicious pizza . Extraordinary staff , Mary who i believe to be the manager is very courteous.

name: Ada Ferrer
text: The pizza is great,  but this place is too cold and sometimes it stinks.

name: Tripp Watkins
text: The pizza here is pretty solid. I like the concept pretty well and the amount of time it takes to make is rather impressive given the quality of the finished product. It's not quite good enough to earn the five star but it is somewhere I would recommend and would definitely go back again.

name: David Ketring
text: I like it better than mod

name: Kevin Luong
text: Pizza is perfectly crispy and the flavors are up to you. Good drink selection too.

name: Megan Munoz
text: Good pizza! You can create your own personal pizza. Fresh food, Great atmosphere, quick service!

name: Barry Helberg
text: I really like this place. Fast food pizza the way you want it for like 8 bucks. It cooks in 3 minutes and the crust is nice and crispy! No frills dining but the pizza is good!

name: Jonathan Cruz
text: My family and I love coming here when we want some fast, delicious pizza! Love that you get to put as many toppings as you want on your pizza! So many types of cheeses, meats, and veggies! The staff are always friendly. And don't forget to ask for ranch when you get your pizza when it's ready.

name: Tricia Bradbury
text: Very similar to MOD Pizza (including noise level).  Thicker crust (just one size) and fewer topping selections.  Flavor was OK, but I prefer MOD.  Large outdoor seating area is nice

name: Kevin Anderson
text: Always good! The staff is very helpful! The brownie was excellent! Get it warmed!

name: Nathaniel Eveland
text: Great food. Pizza is cooked well, and there are a lot of different options for toppings. The food is fairly inexpensive, but of excellent quality.

name: Marla Altemus
text:
The pizza is d e l i c i o u s

Outside tables were kinda dirty though, wish they were a bit cleaner.

name: Haris Qureshi
text: Always 5/5 great pizza. Lots of variety.

name: Anastasia Vasquez
text: Always fast and super delicious! It's our go to pizza place during the week. I love to sit on the patio too when we bring our dog on a nice cool afternoon.

name: Jeremiah Holcomb

name: Jesus Monroy

name: Nikhil Pai
text: This place allows you to make your own pizza or choose a pre-defined pizza that you can customize. Lots of different sauces, cheese, and toppings. ‚Ä¶More

name: J Ngo
text: Good concept.  Order only what you want to put on your pizza and it will be cooked and ready in 3 minutes.  Good variety of cheese, meat topping and veggies .

name: Michael Byerley
text: This is a pizza place is where you build tour own pizza. The pizza ingredients are fresh. The price is very reasonable for the size if pizza you get. This is my favorite place.

text: love the fact that you only pay one price for as many toppings as you want on a pizza. Also they have great tasting salads (the arugula and berries with balsamic glaze is my personal favorite). The staff is friendly and fast.

name: Alex Saing
text: I love it. Both the custom and the stock pizza are the same price. There is a lot of options to choose from as your toppings. I prefer doing custom pizza because you can add your own toppings. It's good! I would go here again.

name: Chris Russek
text: Best build your own pizza!

name: Alfredo Hall

name: Rohit Budhani
text: For those who have never been here. It's like a build your own pizza, choose your crust, sause, toppings and eat! Food flavor is really good. Would recommend

name: Joseph Babu
text: Good pizza.

name: Jermel James
